name: Moodboard Lab
description: Moodboard Lab is a commercial, AI-assisted material and moodboard workspace for architects and designers, enabling users to curate material palettes, receive sustainability insights, generate photorealistic moodboard renders, and apply their selections to uploaded reference images.
author: Jonathan Bassindale
metaTitle: Moodboard Lab — AI-Assisted Material & Moodboard Workspace
metaDescription: Moodboard Lab helps architects and designers curate material palettes, analyse sustainability, and generate photorealistic moodboard renders with AI.

openGraph.title: Moodboard Lab
openGraph.description: AI-assisted material and moodboard workspace for architects and designers.
